Counter Strike is one of the most worldwide popular games in FPS genre. Good game for everyone who are looking for challange, mixed with fun. Game also offers lot's of workshop content to help you train, have fun, and take your skills to the next level. CSGO is  teamplay oriented game and I would recomend it to everyone who is a fan on FPS genre.
